RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Purse 5000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Open to Mixed Breed)Open to Maidens not eligible for the BHS Futurity.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JLM EMBEZZLER QUEEN broke sharp, rallied, best. RISIN COWBOY broke in front, game effort. DCR C NOR DOUBTFIRE good try. NITO SKEETO outside effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Jlm Embezzler Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnston Tyler and Matt Jess R

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 2 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 5000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. If fails to fill Montana Bred by 9:00 am. Race Will Be Taken Open, Montana Breds Preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUFFUM'S BEAUTY pressed pace, dueled outside, up for win. PALACEDANCER went to front, challenged late, out run. CARRIZO SPRINGS hopped start, chased speed. GEBO outside bid. STEALING HEARTS eased.

ENTRY.NAME: Buffum's Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled outside, up for win

ENTRY.NAME: Palacedancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front, challenged late, out run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 3 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 5500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200, if for $2,500, allowed 3 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTTA LOVE IKE chased speed,rallied, pulled off. I'M LUCKY led early, game for place. HILL CROOME late gain. NEW GOSPEL mild bid.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 4 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCE FOR RANSOM held lead, challenged briefly, won driving. SAN GIORGIO chased speed. FINDING SILVER settled back. GOLDEN TIGER failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance for Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: held lead, challenged briefly, won driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 5 3F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIREFLOWER set pressured pace, pulled away. PIERPONT pressured pace 2 wide. LONE SHOTGUN RIDER 3 wide. STONE SECRET late rush outside. MIDNIGHT DRAMA wide trip.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Dan Lockie Derby Trial MILES CITY RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 66. Derby Trial Purse 2500. FOR REGISTERED 3 YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES THAT HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE BY PAYMENTS FOR THE DAN LOCKIE QUARTER HORSE DERBY. No Sex Allowance. $250 at time of Entry. Wts: 124 lbs. Finals To Be Run May 20, 2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BABY I DU all out. WB DASHING BRAT game effort. HEZA SPIRITED ACE lugged out. SPECIAL DIPPER good try. BHR THE BOMB DOT COM pressured outside rail, took hold, no shot. Stewards Inquiry, HEZA SPIRITED ACE was disqualified for Interference with BHR THE BOMB DOT COM and placed from 3rd to 5th

ENTRY.NAME: Bhr the Bomb Dot Com
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured outside rail, took hold, no shot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Dan Lockie Derby Trial MILES CITY RACE 7 300 Y Dirt CR: 66. Derby Trial Purse 2500. FOR REGISTERED 3 YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES THAT HAVE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE BY PAYMENTS FOR THE DAN LOCKIE QUARTER HORSE DERBY. No Sex Allowance. $250 at time of Entry. Wts: 124 lbs. Finals To Be Run May 20, 2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YO MORNING DELITE all out. EYE DINOZZO brushed break. MAKIN IT RAYNE brushed break. VOLCOMS SHADOW steadied at gap, good try.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 8 5 1/4F Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 6500. FOR MONTANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UP WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. If fails to fill Montana Bred, Race Will Be Taken Open, Montana Breds Preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE BONDSMAN gained command, won driving. MAGIC IN A HAT late gain for place. CIRCLE BACK led briefly. ARBUCKLE OUTLAW wide first turn. IMA CARPE DIEM went wide. NUMMY NUM went wide.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MILES CITY RACE 9 630 Y Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 6000. For Three Year Olds and Upward Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.(For Thoroughbreds, Quarter Horses, Paints Or Appaloosa.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERSISTENT TOUCH steadied, taken back, gained, steadied, dueled between rivals. RNC CARDSHARK JONES caught last strided. ROSAT wide trip, late rush for show. SIX FIGURE DIAMONDS late rally three deep. MISTER KURTS LEGACY mild bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Persistent Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied, taken back, gained, steadied, dueled between rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Rosat
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, late rush for show
